channel.title: My server is still banned
channel.description: I've posted a topic on here few days ago and I had a conversation to moparisbest then he just stopped talking. The topic is way down the list now and wont be seen again. I just want this fixed so I can add my server back.

item.title: My server is still banned
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

If your server is banned it’s for a reason, I don’t think bans decide to appear on some servers and not others. If you hop on the IRC sometime, moparisthebest is usually on there and you can ask him.

Read full topic
